Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: HalC8 contains 10 cysteines that could form disulphide bridges, leading to a little decrease in molecular weight.
Sequence Information.Comments: quite stable, can be desalted, boiled, frozen, subjected to organic solvents, and stored in culture supernatant at 4

Literature.Title: Purification and biological characterization of halocin C8, a novel peptide antibiotic from Halobacterium strain AS7092.
Literature.Author: Li Y, Xiang H, Liu J, Zhou M, Tan H.

Literature.Title: A single gene directs both production and immunity of halocin C8 in a haloarchaeal strain AS7092.
Literature.Author: Sun C, Li Y, Mei S, Lu Q, Zhou L, Xiang H.
